rows.label: qst701503_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you've found the materials for me!
How terribly kind of you. Now I can
finally fulfill that old promise.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0002
rows.name:
Will you be OK? Is there anything
else we can help with?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0003
rows.name:
No, no, young lady, I'm quite all right.
Thank you for asking.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0004
rows.name:
I could never face him again if I broke
that promise... What would he think of
me?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0005
rows.name: I don't mean to pry, but who is "he"?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0006
rows.name:
He was my husband...
Though I haven't seen him in decades.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0007
rows.name: Your husband?!

rows.label: qst701503_msg0008
rows.name:
One day years ago, he came home
saying he was taking over the family inn
and wouldn't I like to help out there?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0009
rows.name:
But I'd just become a potter, you see,
and that was all I wanted to do, all I'd
ever wanted to do.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0010
rows.name:
So I sent him packing. Told him maybe
one day, when I'd created my finest
work, I might come back to him.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0011
rows.name:
And that was that? He hasn't tried to
find you since then?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, maybe he knew that wasn't the
whole story... That the thing about my
finest work was just an excuse.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0013
rows.name:
The truth is I didn't hate the idea of
working at the inn. I just hated that he
took it for granted that I would do it.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0014
rows.name:
He didn't consider my work important,
and that hurt most of all because
I loved him. I truly did.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0015
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0016
rows.name:
But look at me, rambling on at you. It's
been a while since I talked about that...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0017
rows.name:
When I finish this vase, will you take it
to him? Say, "Here it is! Mirei's finest
work!"

rows.label: qst701503_msg0018
rows.name:
I'm afraid we'll have to decline that
request.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0019
rows.name: Huh? What are you on about Minochi?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0020
rows.name:
You made the promise. You should
deliver the vase yourself.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0021
rows.name:
You want me to...? After all these
years?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0022
rows.name:
It doesn't matter how many years it's
been. You're here now, aren't you?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0023
rows.name:
There's still time for you to make
good on your promise. Do it now,
before it really is too late.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0024
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]He's still upset about the Deacon...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0025
rows.name:
Laura and Adel are two of the most
kind-hearted fools you ever met. So of
course they want to help you.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0026
rows.name:
They'd do everything in their power
to help. And you would just sit back
and let them.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0027
rows.name:
Heh heh... Very well. I suppose it
wouldn't hurt to get some exercise.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0028
rows.name:
Would you give me a few minutes?
I need to gather my things.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0029
rows.name:
Sorry to keep you waiting. Let's go
and find my husband.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0030
rows.name:
Are you sure you'll be all right walking
all that way?

rows.label: qst701503_msg0031
rows.name:
He should be at the inn in Hyber, so
it isn't all that far. I'll be fine with you
youngsters to help me.

rows.label: qst701503_msg0032
rows.name:
Hyber?
Does that mean your husband is...?!

rows.label: qst701503_msg0033
rows.name:
Heh heh, I haven't been back since the
day we split up...

rows.label: qst701503_msg0034
rows.name:
You may be witness to a bit of a
scene, but I hope you'll stick by me.
